game.name: DCS: AH-64D Outpost Campaign by Stone Sky
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: Explore the chronicles of the Syrian War in the OUTPOST campaign series. In the second instalment, you'll dive into the events of 2012-2017, piloting the AH-64 Apache helicopter. Take on the role of U.S. pilots navigating through some of the most challenging phases of this conflict.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the chronicles of the Syrian War in the OUTPOST campaign series. In the second instalment, you'll dive into the events of 2012-2017, piloting the AH-64 Apache helicopter. Take on the role of U.S. pilots navigating through some of the most challenging phases of this conflict.
